name: jonmw
text: Showbiz is to Todd what Todd is to Pat

name: abe
text: You dis my Todd you fluff my Hog.

name: jaldor
text: Todd is the best damn character in the strip, hands down.

name: dusty
text: Now that it's been three years have you seen the error of your ways?

name: soticoto
text:
Dude... they ain't comin back.
They're gone, man... gone.

name: tekende
text: We used to think that about you.

name: redmange
text: And hope it, and pray it.  And make little collages about it.

name: soticoto
text: In situations like this, I love to disappoint.

name: deimosrising
text: A comment left by deimosrising was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by recognizer, TonyHighwind, rowboat)

name: dans
text: A comment left by dans was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by wharfrat, woneLOVE, rowboat)

name: snowman
text: Well why don't you marry deimosrising then

name: deimosrising
text: I am already married to your mom.

name: snowman
text: MAN I JUST GOT TAKEN TO SCHOOL

name: catgrl131
text: In the vehicle of injury?

name: snowman
text: TOTALLY

name: gazdatronik
text: Todd drives a 1978 fors transit van. It is british.

name: saucy_jack
text: I fail to enjoy Todd because he reminds me of the kind of people who were around in my Childhood.

name: bsidestarchild
text: Those anchor overalls are epic.

name: m3funkyb
text: the anchor overalls are crucial! ole!

name: rowboat
text: The anchor overalls save the arc. They are CPR.

name: kamet
text: Am I correct that those are the same overalls that are in a flashback to (I believe) Cornelius' childhood? Me thinkee so.

name: kickstart
text:
is this what you were thinking of? http://achewood.com/index.php?date=04182006 ? That is a good connection there, my friend!

why was I wearing a sailor suit, mummy? was I in the Navy then?

name: kamet
text: I believe that was what I was thinking.. and I was O so wrong.

name: aelindil
text: Your icon is uh-gfuhing perfectly in time with Spoon's My Mathematical Mind and I am totally entranced by it.

name: philosophe
text: Panda Bear's Good Girl/Carrots for me...

name: seph
text: The little front hatch makes for easy-access Boning.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
Ray played Captain Carl on Pee Wee's Playhouse before he got his big break in Achewood.


Look it up!

name: fuckyoufriday
text: I like the "explosion" effect around Ray's head as his mind is blown by Todd's handcrafted nuthuggers.

name: alejandroadam
text: the last two panels are basicly a great punchline that requres nothing else. not even a basic awareness of the comic.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: You KNOW Todd ain't too bright.

name: qwerty
text: Aside from his thong, those overalls are Ray's only other item of clothing.

name: qatipay
text:
that we've seen at this point? Later on he branches out quite a lot.

Also -- the overalls appear to have a drop-drawer on the FRONT. ?!?

name: pitseleh
text: That's so he can get his bone on without having to take off his amazing overalls.

name: qatipay
text: aughh!

name: ssddr
text: Custom made so he can get his bone on should he ever encounter a fine lady while fishing.

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "This may signal the closure of the thong thing."

name: lawdog
text: This is as close to sentimental as Todd gets.

name: nutmeg
text:
why isn't this strip rated higher?
ray is in a toddler's sailor-themed onesie and todd is in a white thong!

WHAT THE HELL PEOPLE

name: greymantledwolf
text: dumbstruck.

name: aarongstock
text: Not seen: Onstad dropping thongs onto driveway asphalt to determine proper onomatopoeic term.

name: pitseleh
text: ::dies:: Now I'm going to have this mental picture in my mind of him dropping thongs on some driveway somewhere in the world and taking notes on possible terms to use.

name: overmedicated
text: THOP

name: fosters
text: Offscreen, Onstad's neighbors nervously discuss whether or not they need to call the authorities.

name: tekende
text: They have already called; Chris is on their driveway.

name: donnatron
text: Also not seen: Onstad putting tiny thongs on squirrels for visual inspiration.

name: phy
text: Stylish cats choose Osh Kosh overalls.

name: aurorasbored
text: Wait...how did Ray get his thong on without taking off his overalls? That's some reverse Zoolander-esque runway model trickery there.

name: phthoggos
text: he's only holding it, friend.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
todd's thong looks more like a sumo wrestler diaper to me

which is also hilarious

name: cmc
text: the plant gets spiky to signal ray's surprise.

name: howl
text: I thought at first the bushes were clouds, which made it look like the wrath of God was coming down on Todd in the form of Ray.

name: andyboy
text: Teodors duck stalking outfit

name: singtralala
text: todd looks awesome in that thong

name: kyrasmash
text: That is one of the most amazing get ups I have ever seen. On Ray, not Todd. Squirrels shouldn't wear thongs.

name: sweetlips
text: Ray should, no, needs to wear that alternative outfit more.

name: milo
text: reminds me of that Tom & Jerry episode where Tom has his scalp blown off and is wearing a ginger toupee for the rest of the episode

name: fattypneumonia
text:
"Mouse Trouble," 1944. Academy Award winner.

This picture makes me very giggly:

name: fakedaisies
text: This gets a 5 just for the sailor onesie.

name: dusty
text: If you removed the words the third panel could be a Japanese advertisement for thongs.
